name: The Last Data
description:
WARNING The web build is lagging quite a bit, some levels might be unplayable. Feel free to download the windows build if you want a better experience.

An arcade game made for the Ludum Dare 42.

How to play:

  • Get to the exit while being chased by corruption.

Controls:

KeyActionW / Up arrow Move UpS / Down arrowMove DownA / Left arrowMove LeftD / Right arrowMove Right

Team:

  • Gaspard EICHER - Game Art / Animation
  • Alicia MAGISTRELLO - Game Art / Animation
  • Florent JAMET - Game Design / Level Design
  • Clément DURANTI - Programming / Musics

Musics:

https://soundcloud.com/clement-duranti/sets/the-last-data-ld42

Sources soon
